name: Domain Machinery
desc: Making extensive use of Domain-grade machinery, disabled or destroyed components are difficult to replace but it can largely take care of itself and will always be recoverable after combat.

name: Integrated Nanoforge
desc: Making use of highly experimental technology, a corrupted nanoforge has been integrated into this ships systems. Ammo/charge generation for ballistic and missile weapons is increased by %s.
short: Weapons with regenerating ammunition recover ammo significantly quicker.
